refnamediv.refpurpose: Describe the properties of the different H5 objects

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: H5 objects have some accessible properties. All the properties name are case insensitive (except for the path or objects names).

refsection.title: H5 File
H5 Group
H5 Dataset
H5 Dataspace
H5 Attribute
H5 Type
H5 Reference
refsection.para: H5 Reference object wrap an hypermatrix object where elements are a reference to an H5 object.
